Kirbbij Hotels
EXECUTIVE OFFICES
2 WEST 5 5 T-F STREET
N EW YORK 19, N.Y. CIRCLE 7-2200
May 16, 1951
Mr. Graydon Ausmus
WUOA
University of Alabama
University, Alabama
Dear Mr. Ausmus:
Previously we have written to Mr. Seymour Siegel with
reference to Hotel Nacional de Cuba in Havana, or one
of our other hotels as listed at the bottom of this
letterhead, as a site for one of your conventions.
Mr. Siegel suggested that we write to you, as you could
supply us with the information of your convention dates
and locations.
We would be particularly interested in your consideration
of Hotel Nacional because of the splendid facilities
available there, and also the possibility of furthering
Latin American relations.
lour consideration and advice would be greatly appreciated.
Cordially yours,"')
Pool
Director of Sales Promotion
